data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Many people these days are upset over the costs of prescription medication. Some ____ cost ____ of ____ each! The ____ prices ____ it ____ for ____ uninsured ____ afford ____ get ____, ____ seems ____. It doesn't seem right that big companies profit off of the ill.
data.partBlankContent: Many people these days are upset over the costs of prescription medication. Some pi___ cost hund____ of dol____ each! The hi__ prices ma__ it diff_____ for t__ uninsured t_ afford t_ get bet___, wh___ seems unf___. It doesn't seem right that big companies profit off of the ill.
data.fullContent: Many people these days are upset over the costs of prescription medication. Some pills cost hundreds of dollars each! The high prices make it difficult for the uninsured to afford to get better, which seems unfair. It doesn't seem right that big companies profit off of the ill.
data.answer: 如今，许多人对处方药的成本感到不安。有些药丸要几百美元一片!高价格使得没有保险的人很难负担得起病情的好转，这似乎不公平。大公司从病人中获利似乎是不对的。
